block.p: December wedding plans have been announced for Julie Anne Goldstone and David Allen Marcley, the co-owners of Dave's Grill, a restaurant in Montauk, L.I.

Ms. Goldstone, 32, formerly owned Sheldon Communications, a public relations concern in New York. She graduated from Tulane University. She is a daughter of Dr. and Mrs. Sheldon B. Goldstone of Scranton, Pa., where her father is a dermatologist.
December wedding plans have been announced for Julie Anne Goldstone and David Allen Marcley, the co-owners of Dave's Grill, a restaurant in Montauk, L.I.

Ms. Goldstone, 32, formerly owned Sheldon Communications, a public relations concern in New York. She graduated from Tulane University. She is a daughter of Dr. and Mrs. Sheldon B. Goldstone of Scranton, Pa., where her father is a dermatologist.

Mr. Marcley, 39, owned Dave's Downtown and Port Royal, former restaurants in Montauk. He is a son of Mr. and Mrs. Henry I. Marcley of Amityville, L.I. His father, now retired, was an insurance agent in Amityville.
